title: Two
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: In the book Two, students are presented with a familiar number in several ways. The text provides information about the number two through whimsical illustrations and simple text. Students will enjoy searching the illustrations for the "2" hidden on each page. Use this book to teach students about asking and answering questions and finding details to support the main idea.
highFrequencyWords: Guided Reading Lesson PDF
comprehension: Ask and answer questions to understand text
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
wordWork: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
